He who worshipped the Community,
And the Buddha, the Leader of the World,

For seventy-seven times,
He will rule as king of the gods;
For eight hundred times he will rule as king,
Dwelling on the earth.
For fifty-five times,
He will be a Wheel-turning King;
His wealth will be immeasurable,
